TopicTitle: Parts are invisible when loading a craft file, but the parts are visible when you get them out of the part menu.

Articles.Content:
Picture

When I load in a craft file it shows the parts for 0.1 seconds then disappear.... when you get them out of the part list you can see them. Why? The person making the mod does not even know.

The mod:

I have been able to fix this bug. The problem was giving the mod "Texture Replacer". I have fixed it by installing an old version of the mod:

https://github.com/ducakar/TextureReplacer/releases/tag/v3.6
